 upgrade_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
 effect_description TEXT
)

SELECT player_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_amount > 5000
